activities:
(1) CORTERA TRANSACTIONS: Cortera will use information to process transactions with parties entering into business relations with Cortera and its affiliates. The identifiable information will permit Cortera to complete business transactions, deliver products and services, administer individual accounts, provide customer support and meet government regulatory requirements.
(2) APPLICATION SERVICE PROVIDER: Cortera is an application service provider that provides commercial credit and collections workflow automation applications.  In the course of being an application service provider, Cortera may process and store personal information pertaining to customers of Cortera’s clients.  In this context, Cortera acts as a data processor on behalf of its clients.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: Better Business Bureau EU Safe Harbor Dispute Resolution Program
